Package org.sd.cluster.job.work

Interface Summary
QueueChooser Interface for choosing a queue's name based on a workRequest.
QueueDesignator Interface for designating a queue's name based on work.
WorkClient Interface for requesting work from a work job.
Worker Interface for performing work for a job.
WorkQueue Interface for collecting and distributing work.
WorkServer Interface for serving work from a work job.
 

Class Summary
AbstractWorkServer Abstract work server implementation.
DrainageWorker A worker for testing that will drain a server's work to a flat file.
DummyWorkServer A work server that serves only WAITING work.
FileQueueWorkServer Queue work server that loads in file paths.
JobCommunicator Helper utility to send/receive messages from jobs.
KeyedWork Container class for work and its key.
LogWrapper Utility class for managing logging units of work and tracking rates, etc.
LogWrapper.LogStore  
QueueWorkClient Work client that requests work from a local queue.
QueueWorkServer Queue work server implementation (based on BerkeleyDb).
ServerWorkClient Work client that requests work from a work job with a work server.
WaitingKeyedWork KeyedWork for holding values for a waiting response signal from a server.
WaitingWorkClient A work client that waits for its (dataless) worker to finish.
WorkJob A job for serving and/or requesting and doing work.
WorkPool A thread pool for handling work units in multiple threads.
WorkRequest A request package as payload to a job command message to a work server.
WorkResponse A response from a work server to a request for work.
 

Enum Summary
WorkRequest.RequestType  
WorkResponseStatus Enumeration of work response status types.
